name: Big Thinkers 1st Grade
description: Big Thinkers 1st Grade is the perfect learning supplement to your child's classroom experience. Ben and Becky Brightly's contagious wonder and ability to transform themselves into a variety of shapes and forms engage kids in a fun world of learning and discovery!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: This is honestly, the BEST game I have ever played.  The main protagonists give you helpful guides and tips to make it to each new room as you progress through the game. The game creates a sense of home, and warmth as you get to know the characters. The developers constantly release updates for this game, as every day I am faced with a new update, adding more Operations or packs to unlock. With each coming expansion it is futile not to buy. Best game 10/10
Now ready to take on my journeyman exam!  100/10
